events.name: TOTALLY INSEPARABLE: Design & UI UX
events.description: Hello Singaporeans! Here we are, bringing the 2nd Exabytes Designer Club (EDC) Gathering to Singapore! Why don't make your Friday night a meaningful one by joining us to EXPLORE & LEARN new things together?  This time, we are excited to have Ms Nina Geometrieva (Design Lead of Grab) as one of the speakers!   Who is Nina? • Design Lead of Grab; Chief Creative Officer of Paktor App • She is rated as one of the top designers by Behance, and have been featured in publications such as Computer Arts, Smashing Magazine & Canva.  • She is passionate about living forever, drones, virtual reality and the future in general Sharing Topic:  Don’t Repeat My Mistakes! – A Journey to Become a Better Designer Nina will be covering some DOs and DON'Ts, common mistakes to avoid, and the shift of mindset necessary to become a great designer. To find out how to become a successful designer like her, make sure you join us at the very exciting 2nd EDC gathering! More about Nina: • Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/geometrieva/ • Behance Profile: https://www.behance.net/ninageo -------------- Our next speaker will be covering one of the hottest topics nowadays, UI UX. He will be guiding you not just on transforming ideas into screens, but also increasing clicks by showing us how Internet users interact with websites and apps!  Who is Yugene? Yugene has over 4 years of digital design experience. With a background in computer science and strong interest in design, he has a flair for combining design thinking with leading technology. He has served a wide range of clients, includuing Lay’s, Orchard Central, ST Enterprise, Singapore Olympics and Newsloop. Yugene is currently running JIN Design, a firm that provides bespoke digital interface design services. Sharing Topic:  Interaction & Interface DesignDesigning an interface is no longer just a static screen. An image is worth a thousand words but an interactive showcase is worth a hundred pictures. The job of UI designer is no longer just transforming ideas into screens, but also to act as a lead to guide how a user will interact with the website or application. More about Yugene:Website:  http://yugenelee.com/ Join us this time to learn from the experts and have fun together!
events.location: 140 Paya Lebar Road,  #08-02 AZ @ Paya Lebar, Singapore
